Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class Player is a representation of a person playing a Card game. A player has a name, a hand (containing their cards)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(java.lang.String name)
      Instantiates a new player with a name, an empty hand
      Player(java.lang.String name, Hand hand)
      Instantiates a new player with a name, an existing hand of cards and a score of zero.

      Check if the player's hand contains a given suit.

      Check if the player's hand contains only a given suit.

      Pick up card and add it to the players hand

      • playCard

        public boolean playCard(Card c)
        Plays the card matching a given card (if the given card is in the player's hand)
        Parameters:
        c - the card to be played
        Returns:
        true, if the card is in the players hand and therefore able to be played
        See Also:
        List.remove(Object)
